body:
I have yet to find a pornhwa with something good except for the art style

I swear to matsuri every fucking pornhwa has nice  art style but dialogues, story, characters like everything else is just retarded
oh i remember i was hype by this, but in the end the MC became a SIMP!!! lol
You take mine I'll take yours.
Aaaaand he's passing her around. Typical. This is the weirdest kink that manhwa and hentai have. I hate it. I can bear NTR, ugly bastard, but that one is just so retarded.

@HornyHammer nahh.....in the end their relation is reverse...She become the master and the guy is the slave....

Not only that she, seem to have other men to
Damn, without exception every hentai with this artstyle is full of the most morally repulsive shit. It sucks too, because I actually like the artstyle, but everything else is awful.

Welp this is pornhwa for you. They are mostly stories about sluts, degenerates, douchebags, all fringy shits out there, Korean-style; which makes wholesome vanilla a rarity. And this is what porn does: to explore the taboo side of sexuality.
So this is basically a revenge story? Its interesting but the MC doesn't have to be such a douchebag to the supposedly FMC
